text: Earth Hour is an event organized by the World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF). It is held on the last Saturday of March every year. The WWF asks people to shut off their lights and appliances for one hour. They want to raise awareness for climate change. It was started in 2007. ==Other websites== * Category:International environmental organizations Category:Climate change Category:Energy conservation Category:2007 establishments Category:March observances
title: Earth Hour
